Class ec.ifc.stonelook.SLContainerView 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.View
           |
           +----netscape.application.ContainerView

                   +----ec.ifc.stonelook.SLContainerView
public class SLContainerView
extends ContainerView
Subclass of ContainerView that sets up the stone-texture look.

SLContainerView()
Creates a new SLContainerView with lowered bezel border and textured background.
SLContainerView(int)
Creates a new SLContainerView with an SLBezelBorder.

SLContainerView 
  public SLContainerView()
Creates a new SLContainerView with lowered bezel border and textured background.
SLContainerView 
  public SLContainerView(int borderType)
Creates a new SLContainerView with an SLBezelBorder. The border type is set by borderType (BezelBorder.LOWERED or BezelBorder.RAISED). The background of the container is textured. To create an untextured SLContainerView, call setImage(null) after constructing.
